contentrichtext.text: The '''Quepano''' were a band of [[Indigenous peoples of the Americas|American Indians]] that lived in the region around [[Cerralvo]], in northeastern [[Nuevo LeÃ³n]], near the end of the seventeenth century; some were also known to be at the [[San Antonio de Valero Mission]] in [[San Antonio, Texas|San Antonio]] during the first half of the next century. They appear to have been [[Coahuiltecan]]s. ==See also== [http://www.tshaonline.org/handbook/online/articles/QQ/bmq6.html Handbook of Texas entry] [[Category:Native American tribes in Texas]] {{NorthAm-native-stub}}
